sourcesContent:
<template >

<Navbar v-if="this.showNavbar" />
  


<router-view></router-view>
</template>
<script>

import Navbar from './components/Navbar.vue';
import { EventBus } from './eventBus';



export default{
    components: {
        
        Navbar,
        
        
    },
    data() {
        return {
        showNavbar: JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("showNavbar")) || false,
        };
    },
    mounted() {
        // `mitt` ile EventBus kullanımı
        EventBus.on('updateNavbar', (value) => {
        this.showNavbar = value;
        localStorage.setItem("showNavbar", value);
        });
    },
    beforeUnmount() {
        // Event listener'ı kaldırmak için
        EventBus.off('updateNavbar');
        localStorage.setItem("showNavbar",false);
        localStorage.setItem("ActiveUserId",-1);
        localStorage.setItem("ActiveUserType","");
    },
    
    
    
    

}
    
    
</script>
